channel.title: Cant edit cache
channel.description:
Cant open cache with Tom's Suite program freezes when I try advise/help please.
*update* downloaded any size toms suite got it edited but now I'm getting this when I run client. [code]OS: Windows 7 6.1 Client. Revision: 317 Loaded Maps: 1676 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Sprite.<init>(Sprite.java:165) at client.startUp(client.java:7693) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:34) at client.run(client.java:5416) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code]

item.title: Cant edit cache
item.dc:creator: @NSrepa NSrepa
item.description:
@NSrepa wrote:

Cant open cache with Tom’s Suite program freezes when I try advise/help please.

update downloaded any size toms suite got it edited but now I’m getting this when I run client.

OS: Windows 7 6.1 Client. Revision: 317 Loaded Maps: 1676 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Sprite.<init>(Sprite.java:165) at client.startUp(client.java:7693) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:34) at client.run(client.java:5416) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
